mapper.sql: id, user_id, careers, privilege, privilegetype, certificate, identity, assess, hosptial
mapper.select: select user_tbl.*, web_user_tbl.* from web_user_tbl LEFT JOIN user_tbl ON user_tbl.id = web_user_tbl.user_id where 1=1 AND web_user_tbl.user_id > 0 and user_tbl.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select user_tbl.*, web_user_tbl.* from user_tbl
LEFT JOIN web_user_tbl ON user_tbl.id = web_user_tbl.user_id where 1=1 and user_tbl.name = #{0} and user_tbl.password = #{1}

select user_tbl.*, web_user_tbl.* from user_tbl LEFT JOIN web_user_tbl ON user_tbl.id = web_user_tbl.user_id where 1 = 1
AND user_tbl.name like CONCAT('%',#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND web_user_tbl.user_id > 0 ORDER BY web_user_tbl.id

select user_tbl.*, web_user_tbl.* from user_tbl LEFT JOIN web_user_tbl ON user_tbl.id = web_user_tbl.user_id where 1 = 1
AND user_tbl.name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND user_tbl.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND web_user_tbl.user_id > 0 ORDER BY web_user_tbl.id
mapper.delete: delete user_tbl, web_user_tbl from user_tbl, web_user_tbl where web_user_tbl.user_id = user_tbl.id AND user_tbl.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update user_tbl as u, web_user_tbl as w set u.name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, u.age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, u.avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.verification = #{verification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.background_icon = #{backgroundIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u.id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w.careers = #{careers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w.privilege = #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w.privilegetype = #{privilegetype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, w.certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w.identity = #{identity,jdbcType=BIT}, w.assess = #{assess,jdbcType=TINYINT} where u.id = w.user_id AND id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
